etomica.normalmode

Class MeterDirectSamplingHarmonic

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.normalmode.MeterDirectSamplingHarmonic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterDirectSamplingHarmonic
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEtomicaDataSource
    Meter used for overlap sampling in the harmonic-sampled system. The meter measures the boltzmann factor difference for the harmonic and target potentials.
